api_list.name: Word link to PDF
api_list.description: Send a json with the key"link" and  your URL string
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exact-word-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com/wordlink_2pdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exact-word-to-pdf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
